title: How To Tweak Your Portfolio For A More Active Government
description: Reshma Kapadia, associate editor at Barron's, and Olga Bitel, global equity strategist at William Blair,  discuss why government policy may have a bigger role in markets - and how to prepare for it.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
